judge:
Care and Protection
of Children Act
full_text:
IN THE COURT OF THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE-L,
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Present:-Smt. Karthika S Varma, Judicial First Class Magistrate-L,
Thiruvananthapuram
Dated this the 17" day of December 2024
C.P. No. 23/2024
Complainant : State-Represented by the Sub Inspector of Police, Sreekaryam
Police Station in Crime No. 809/2024.
(By Assistant Public Prosecutor)
Accused : Umesh Unnikrishnan Nambeeshan, aged 45 years, S/o. K P
Unnikrishnan, resident of Kamala vihar, TC
5/3723(BN.111),Durga Lane, Babuji Nagar, Pongumoodu,
Cheruvakkal ard, Cheruvakkal Village from Archana
Veetil, Kottoor P O, Kozhikode Nadavannoor
(By Advocate Smt. Anithas Jacob)
Offences : U/Ss.109(1), 118(2) of BNS and 75 JJ Act
Sentence/Order : The case against the accused is committed to the Hon'ble Court
of Sessions, Thiruvananthapuram U/s.209(a) of Cr.P.C.
The Accused is under custody.
This case having come up for consideration before this Court on
17.12.2024 and the court passed the following:-
ORDER
1. This is a case wherein Charge Sheet was filed by the Sub Inspector of
Police, Sreekaryam Police Station in Crime No. 809/24 against the Accused
alleging commission of offences punishable u/Ss.1109(1), 118(2) of BNS and 75 JJ
Act.
2. The Prosecution case is that the Petitioner herein due to some unknown
animosity towards his wife and 10-year-old child, stabbed them both in their
abdomen with a knife on 06.08.2024 at 09:00 AM in the morning in their rented
residence. The wife and minor child of the Petitioner were seriously injured and
taken to the hospital in critical care. Thereby the Petitioner is alleged to have
committed the aforesaid offences.

3. Accused is under custody. Copies of all relevant Prosecution records were
furnished to him and thereby the mandate u/s. 207 of Cr.P.C. was complied
with.
4. From the perusal of the records, it is noted that the offences alleged
against the Accused, those which are exclusively triable by the Hon'ble Court of
Sessions as it involves offence under section Juvenile Justice Care and Protection
of Children Act, 2015. Hence, this case is therefore committed to the Hon'ble
Court of Sessions, Thiruvananthapuram under section U/s.209(a) Cr.PC.
5. The Accused continues to remain in judicial custody. He shall be
produced before the Hon’ble Court of Sessions,Thiruvananthapuram as and
when required.
6. The entire case records including the documents and material objects shall
be forwarded to the Hon’ble Court of Sessions, Thiruvananthapuram at the
earliest, subject to Rule 77(2) of the Criminal Rules of Practice, Kerala.
7. Notify the Learned Assistant Public Prosecutor as to the committal of the
above case to the Hon’ble Court of Sessions U/s.209(d) of Code of Criminal
Procedure, 1973.
8. The office is directed to keep copies of all relevant records prior to the
same being send to the Hon'ble Court of Sessions.
(Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected
and pronounced by me in open Court on this the 17" day of December, 2024.)

Sd/-

Judicial First Class Magistrate-I,

Thiruvananthapuram

True Copy
Judicial First Class Magistrate-I,
Thiruvananthapuram
